description: Today it`s the energetic Kana whom Rakka visits at work as apprentice in the town`s clock tower. Still disturbed from her dream about a crow, Rakka learns a number of things, such as why Kana chose this job and why she doesn`t want to feed the crows - but not what`s beyond the wall, as even the clock tower in the center of the town isn`t high enough for that. And why can Rakka remember how to ride a bicycle but not a single one of the songs she used to sing?

titles.title: Der Tag des Mülls / Glockenturm / Vögel, die über die Mauer fliegen
Dzień wyrzucania śmieci; Wieża zegarowa; Ptaki przelatujące nad murem
Gomi no Hi - Tokeitou - Kabe o Koeru Tori
Jour des poubelles - Horloge - Vol au-dessus des murs
Trash Day / Clock Tower / Birds Flying over the Walls
День мусора — Часовая башня — Птицы, которые летают за стену
ゴミの日・時計塔・壁を越える鳥
